Nyckel Accepted to Y Combinator (W22)

Nyckel has been accepted to Y Combinator batch of Winter 2022!
Oscar Beijbom
Posted Jan 2022

It is our pleasure to announce that Nyckel has been accepted to Y Combinator, the renowned startup accelerator, as part of the Winter 2022 cohort.

Our goal is to leverage the YC network of advisors, peers and alumni to accelerate our mission of bringing Machine Learning to developers all over the world. YC has a unique track record of helping founders grow their businesses quickly and sustainably, and we are beyond excited to participate.

More to come soon – it is going to be an amazing ride!

Subscribe for more ML content

You'll get periodic newsletters around machine learning, classification, and how anyone can build their own AI/ML models in just minutes.
